entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:03 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 8:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 47 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: E 14 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to periods of freezing rain in the evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
